mapper.name: BaseMapper
mapper.select: SELECT CUST_NO, EVNT_ID FROM TEST WHERE 1=1 AND ORGN_DTM BETWEEN #{START} || '999999' AND #{END} || '999999' ORDER BY CUST_NO ASC, ORGN_DTM ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEST (CUST_NO, ORGN_DTM, EVNT_ID, EVNT_NM, SYS_EVNT_ID, SYS_EVNT_NM) VALUES (#{CUSTNO}, SYSDATE, #{EVNT_ID}, #{EVNT_NM}, #{SYS_EVNT_ID}, #{SYS_EVNT_NM} )
INSERT INTO TEST (CUST_NO, ORGN_DTM, EVNT_ID, EVNT_NM, SYS_EVNT_ID, SYS_EVNT_NM) VALUES (:1, :2, :3, :4, :5, :6)
